title: {account} - Powered By Kayako
validation_errors: Please check you’ve filled everything in correctly

texteditor.notes_reminder: This private note will only be seen by agents
texteditor.case_notes_reminder: This private conversation note will only be seen by agents
texteditor.user_notes_reminder: This private user note will only be seen by agents
texteditor.org_notes_reminder: This private organization note will only be seen by agents
texteditor.image_upload_in_progress: The image is still uploading. Please wait until it's done. If it takes too long, refresh the page and try again.

uploads.dropzone: Drag and drop files to upload
uploads.toolarge: is too large. Attachments must be under {filesizeLimit, number}MB.
uploads.wrongtype: is not allowed. Allowed file types:
uploads.failed: There was a problem uploading file(s)
uploads.twitter_validation_failed: For Twitter reply you may attach up to 4 photos less than 3MB each, 1 animated GIF less than 3MB or 1 MP4 less than 15MB.
uploads.avatar_validation: Please upload only JPG, GIF or PNG files less than 800KB in size.
uploads.facebook_not_allowed: Attachments aren't supported yet for Facebook replies.
uploads.no_channel: You need to select a channel before you can upload files.
uploads.not_allowed: Uh oh! Seems like you can't upload a file here.

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
confirm.trashcases: Are you sure you want to trash these?

emptytrash.header: Are you sure you want to permanently remove all trashed conversations from Kayako?
emptytrash.body: Warning: You can't undo this action.

confirm.lose_changes: You have unsaved changes on this page. Are you sure you want to discard these changes?

create_user_panel.title: Create a new user
create_user_panel.info: You can add additional contact details once you’ve created the user.
create_user_panel.user_exists_toast: This email already belongs to someone

create_organization_panel.title: Create a new organization
create_organization_panel.info: You can add additional details and contact information once you’ve created the organization.

license_expired: Your request wasn’t saved because your subscription has expired.
license_expired_href: Click here to renew your subscription
permissions_denied: Sorry, you don’t have access to perform this action. Please ask for permissions from an admin.
user_credential_expired: The credential (e.g. password) is valid but has expired
resource_not_found: Resource does not exist or has been removed

create_case_panel.title: Create a new conversation
create_case_panel.info: You can add more detail to this conversation after you’ve created it.

identities.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this identity?
identities.unverified: This identity has not been verified

error.field_required: This action requires the field to be specified
error.field_duplicate: The value of the field is already used for another resource
error.field_empty: The value of the field cannot be empty
error.field_invalid: The value of the field is invalid

select.select_or_type_to_search: Select an option or type to search

not_found.heading: Sorry{name}, we couldn’t find that.
not_found.description1: If you got here because you clicked on something in the product, please email us: support@kayako.com
not_found.description2: Otherwise, please check the url is correct and try again!

unsaved_tab_changes: Wait! You have unsaved changes on this tab. Continuing will result in you losing these changes.

item.copy_link: Share a link to this post

kie.term_too_small: Please enter at least 3 characters to search
kie.invalid_format: No results were found, please enter a valid email address to add a user

no_user_matching_term: Uh oh! No one matching "{term}" was found
app_version_out_of_date: Kayako has been updated. Reload to use the latest version.
block_subscription_downgrade: You can't downgrade your support plan.
